ref: 126 aṅgāraka ʻ *red like embers ʼ, m. ʻ charcoal; name of various plants ʼ (aṅgārikā -- f. ʻ stalk of sugar -- cane, flower of Butea frondosa ʼ). 2. m. ʻ the planet Mars ʼ. [áṅgāra -- ]
Pa. aṅgāraka -- ʻ red like charcoal ʼ;
S. aṅārī f. ʻ smut in wheat ʼ;
bhal. aṅā́ri f. ʻ a plant with red flowers ʼ.
bhal. aṅā́ri f. ʻ a plant with red flowers ʼ.
